preferences.name: username
preferences.title: Username
preferences.description: Instapaper username. Most likely to be your e-mail.

preferences.name: password
preferences.title: Password
preferences.description: Instapaper password, if any. Stored in your Firefox unencrypted. Sent to Instapaper only via HTTPS.

preferences.name: combo
preferences.title: Hotkey
preferences.description: Combination of keys used to save URL of your current active tab. Leave blank to turn it off. You will need to restart your browser. See hotkey syntax: http://mzl.la/1nTyp0M.

preferences.name: click
preferences.title: Point hotkey
preferences.description: Combination of keys, including left mouse click, which sends the pressed link to Instapaper. Leave blank to turn it off. You will need to restart your browser.
